import React from 'react' import { useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import productReducer from '../redux/reducers/productReducer' import { editProducts } from '../redux/actions/productsActions' const EditProduct = () => { const { register, handleSubmit, errors } = useForm() const dispatch = useDispatch() const onSubmit = (data) => { console.log('this is the data', data) dispatch(editProducts(data.productName, data)) } return (

Edit a Product

) } export default EditProduct
